00124 int
00125 cuddExact(
00126   DdManager * table,
00127   int  lower,
00128   int  upper)
00129 {
00130     int  k, i, j;
00131     int  maxBinomial, oldSubsets, newSubsets;
00132     int  subsetCost;
00133     int  size, unused, nvars, level, result;
00134     int  upperBound, lowerBound, cost;
00135     int  roots;
00136     char  *mask = NULL;
00137     DdHalfWord  *symmInfo = NULL;
00138     DdHalfWord **newOrder = NULL;
00139     DdHalfWord **oldOrder = NULL;
00140     int  *newCost = NULL;
00141     int  *oldCost = NULL;
00142     DdHalfWord **tmpOrder;
00143     int  *tmpCost;
00144     DdHalfWord *bestOrder = NULL;
00145     DdHalfWord *order;
00146 #ifdef DD_STATS
00147     int  ddTotalSubsets;
00148 #endif
00149 
00150     /* Restrict the range to be reordered by excluding unused variables
00151     ** at the two ends. */
00152     while (table->subtables[lower].keys == 1 &&
00153            table->vars[table->invperm[lower]]->ref == 1 &&
00154            lower < upper)
00155         lower++;
00156     while (table->subtables[upper].keys == 1 &&
00157            table->vars[table->invperm[upper]]->ref == 1 &&
00158            lower < upper)
00159         upper--;
00160     if (lower == upper) return(1); /* trivial problem */
00161 
00162     /* Apply symmetric sifting to get a good upper bound and to extract
00163     ** symmetry information. */
00164     result = cuddSymmSiftingConv(table,lower,upper);
00165     if (result == 0) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00166 
00167 #ifdef DD_STATS
00168     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00169     ddTotalShuffles = 0;
00170     ddTotalSubsets = 0;
00171 #endif
00172 
00173     nvars = table->size;
00174     size = upper - lower + 1;
00175     unused = 0;
00176     for (i = lower + 1; i < upper; i++) {
00177         if (table->subtables[i].keys == 1 &&
00178             table->vars[table->invperm[i]]->ref == 1)
00179             unused++;
00180     }
00181 
00182     /* Initialization. */
00183 
00184     maxBinomial = getMaxBinomial(size-unused);
00185     if (maxBinomial == -1) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00186 
00187     newOrder = getMatrix(maxBinomial, size);
00188     if (newOrder == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00189 
00190     newCost = ALLOC(int, maxBinomial);
00191     if (newCost == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00192 
00193     oldOrder = getMatrix(maxBinomial, size);
00194     if (oldOrder == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00195 
00196     oldCost = ALLOC(int, maxBinomial);
00197     if (oldCost == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00198 
00199     bestOrder = ALLOC(DdHalfWord, size);
00200     if (bestOrder == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00201 
00202     mask = ALLOC(char, nvars);
00203     if (mask == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00204 
00205     symmInfo = initSymmInfo(table, lower, upper);
00206     if (symmInfo == NULL) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00207 
00208     roots = ddCountRoots(table, lower, upper);
00209 
00210     /* Initialize the old order matrix for the empty subset and the best
00211     ** order to the current order.
00212     */
00213     oldSubsets = 1;
00214     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00215         oldOrder[0][i] = bestOrder[i] = (DdHalfWord) table->invperm[i+lower];
00216     }
00217     subsetCost = table->constants.keys;
00218     for (i = upper + 1; i < nvars; i++)
00219         subsetCost += getLevelKeys(table,i);
00220     oldCost[0] = subsetCost;
00221     upperBound = table->keys - table->isolated;
00222 
00223     /* Now consider subsets of increasing size. */
00224     for (k = 1; k <= size; k++) {
00225 #if DD_STATS
00226         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Processing subsets of size %d\n", k);
00227         fflush(stdout);
00228 #endif
00229         newSubsets = 0;
00230         level = size - k;                 /* first bottom variable */
00231 
00232         for (i = 0; i < oldSubsets; i++) { /* for each subset of size k-1 */
00233             order = oldOrder[i];
00234             cost = oldCost[i];
00235             lowerBound = computeLB(table, order, roots, cost, lower, upper,
00236                                    level);
00237             if (lowerBound >= upperBound)
00238                 continue;
00239             /* Impose new order. */
00240             result = ddShuffle(table, order, lower, upper);
00241             if (result == 0) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00242             upperBound = updateUB(table,upperBound,bestOrder,lower,upper);
00243             /* For each top bottom variable. */
00244             for (j = level; j >= 0; j--) {
00245                 /* Skip unused variables. */
00246                 if (table->subtables[j-1].keys == 1 &&
00247                     table->vars[table->invperm[j-1]]->ref == 1) continue;
00248                 /* Find cost under this order. */
00249                 subsetCost = cost + getLevelKeys(table, lower + level);
00250                 newSubsets = updateEntry(table, order, level, subsetCost,
00251                                          newOrder, newCost, newSubsets, mask,
00252                                          lower, upper);
00253                 if (j == 0)
00254                     break;
00255                 if (checkSymmInfo(table, symmInfo, order[j-1], level) == 0)
00256                     continue;
00257                 pushDown(order,j-1,level);
00258                 /* Impose new order. */
00259                 result = ddShuffle(table, order, lower, upper);
00260                 if (result == 0) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00261                 upperBound = updateUB(table,upperBound,bestOrder,lower,upper);
00262             } /* for each bottom variable */
00263         } /* for each subset of size k */
00264 
00265         /* New orders become old orders in preparation for next iteration. */
00266         tmpOrder = oldOrder; tmpCost = oldCost;
00267         oldOrder = newOrder; oldCost = newCost;
00268         newOrder = tmpOrder; newCost = tmpCost;
00269 #ifdef DD_STATS
00270         ddTotalSubsets += newSubsets;
00271 #endif
00272         oldSubsets = newSubsets;
00273     }
00274     result = ddShuffle(table, bestOrder, lower, upper);
00275     if (result == 0) goto cuddExactOutOfMem;
00276 #ifdef DD_STATS
00277 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00278     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00279 #endif
00280     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:S_EXACT   %8d: total subsets\n",ddTotalSubsets);
00281     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:H_EXACT   %8d: total shuffles", ddTotalShuffles);
00282 #endif
00283 
00284     freeMatrix(newOrder);
00285     freeMatrix(oldOrder);
00286     FREE(bestOrder);
00287     FREE(oldCost);
00288     FREE(newCost);
00289     FREE(symmInfo);
00290     FREE(mask);
00291     return(1);
00292 
00293 cuddExactOutOfMem:
00294 
00295     if (newOrder != NULL) freeMatrix(newOrder);
00296     if (oldOrder != NULL) freeMatrix(oldOrder);
00297     if (bestOrder != NULL) FREE(bestOrder);
00298     if (oldCost != NULL) FREE(oldCost);
00299     if (newCost != NULL) FREE(newCost);
00300     if (symmInfo != NULL) FREE(symmInfo);
00301     if (mask != NULL) FREE(mask);
00302     table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00303     return(0);
00304 
00305 } /* end of cuddExact */

00323 static int
00324 getMaxBinomial(
00325   int  n)
00326 {
00327     int *numerator;
00328     int i, j, k, y, g, result;
00329 
00330     k = (n & ~1) >> 1;
00331 
00332     numerator = ALLOC(int,k);
00333     if (numerator == NULL) return(-1);
00334     
00335     for (i = 0; i < k; i++)
00336         numerator[i] = n - i;
00337     
00338     for (i = k; i > 1; i--) {
00339         y = i;
00340         for (j = 0; j < k; j++) {
00341             if (numerator[j] == 1) continue;
00342             g = gcd(numerator[j], y);
00343             if (g != 1) {
00344                 numerator[j] /= g;
00345                 if (y == g) break;
00346                 y /= g;
00347             }
00348         }
00349     }
00350 
00351     result = 1;
00352     for (i = 0; i < k; i++)
00353         result *= numerator[i];
00354 
00355     FREE(numerator);
00356     return(result);
00357 
00358 }  /* end of getMaxBinomial */
00359 
00360 
00373 static int
00374 gcd(
00375   int  x,
00376   int  y)
00377 {
00378     int a;
00379     int b;
00380     int lsbMask;
00381 
00382     /* GCD(n,0) = n. */
00383     if (x == 0) return(y);
00384     if (y == 0) return(x);
00385 
00386     a = x; b = y; lsbMask = 1;
00387     
00388     /* Here both a and b are != 0. The iteration maintains this invariant.
00389     ** Hence, we only need to check for when they become equal.
00390     */
00391     while (a != b) {
00392         if (a & lsbMask) {
00393             if (b & lsbMask) {  /* both odd */
00394                 if (a < b) {
00395                     b = (b - a) >> 1;
00396                 } else {
00397                     a = (a - b) >> 1;
00398                 }
00399             } else {            /* a odd, b even */
00400                 b >>= 1;
00401             }
00402         } else {
00403             if (b & lsbMask) {  /* a even, b odd */
00404                 a >>= 1;
00405             } else {            /* both even */
00406                 lsbMask <<= 1;
00407             }
00408         }
00409     }
00410 
00411     return(a);
00412 
00413 } /* end of gcd */
00414 
00415 
00428 static DdHalfWord **
00429 getMatrix(
00430   int  rows /* number of rows */,
00431   int  cols /* number of columns */)
00432 {
00433     DdHalfWord **matrix;
00434     int i;
00435 
00436     if (cols*rows == 0) return(NULL);
00437     matrix = ALLOC(DdHalfWord *, rows);
00438     if (matrix == NULL) return(NULL);
00439     matrix[0] = ALLOC(DdHalfWord, cols*rows);
00440     if (matrix[0] == NULL) return(NULL);
00441     for (i = 1; i < rows; i++) {
00442         matrix[i] = matrix[i-1] + cols;
00443     }
00444     return(matrix);
00445 
00446 } /* end of getMatrix */
00447

00460 static void
00461 freeMatrix(
00462   DdHalfWord ** matrix)
00463 {
00464     FREE(matrix[0]);
00465     FREE(matrix);
00466     return;
00467 
00468 } /* end of freeMatrix */

00483 static int
00484 getLevelKeys(
00485   DdManager * table,
00486   int  l)
00487 {
00488     int isolated;
00489     int x;        /* x is an index */
00490 
00491     x = table->invperm[l];
00492     isolated = table->vars[x]->ref == 1;
00493 
00494     return(table->subtables[l].keys - isolated);
00495 
00496 } /* end of getLevelKeys */

00515 static int
00516 ddShuffle(
00517   DdManager * table,
00518   DdHalfWord * permutation,
00519   int  lower,
00520   int  upper)
00521 {
00522     DdHalfWord  index;
00523     int         level;
00524     int         position;
00525     int         numvars;
00526     int         result;
00527 #ifdef DD_STATS
00528     long        localTime;
00529     int         initialSize;
00530 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00531     int         finalSize;
00532 #endif
00533     int         previousSize;
00534 #endif
00535 
00536 #ifdef DD_STATS
00537     localTime = util_cpu_time();
00538     initialSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00539 #endif
00540 
00541     numvars = table->size;
00542 
00543 #if 0
00544     (void) fprintf(stdout,"%d:", ddTotalShuffles);
00545     for (level = 0; level < numvars; level++) {
00546         (void) fprintf(stdout," %d", table->invperm[level]);
00547     }
00548     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00549 #endif
00550 
00551     for (level = 0; level <= upper - lower; level++) {
00552         index = permutation[level];
00553         position = table->perm[index];
00554 #ifdef DD_STATS
00555         previousSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00556 #endif
00557         result = ddSiftUp(table,position,level+lower);
00558         if (!result) return(0);
00559     }
00560 
00561 #ifdef DD_STATS
00562     ddTotalShuffles++;
00563 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00564     finalSize = table->keys - table->isolated;
00565     if (finalSize < initialSize) {
00566         (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00567     } else if (finalSize > initialSize) {
00568         (void) fprintf(stdout,"+");
00569     } else {
00570         (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00571     }
00572     if ((ddTotalShuffles & 63) == 0) (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00573     fflush(stdout);
00574 #endif
00575 #endif
00576 
00577     return(1);
00578 
00579 } /* end of ddShuffle */
00580 
00581 
00595 static int
00596 ddSiftUp(
00597   DdManager * table,
00598   int  x,
00599   int  xLow)
00600 {
00601     int        y;
00602     int        size;
00603 
00604     y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00605     while (y >= xLow) {
00606         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y,x);
00607         if (size == 0) {
00608             return(0);
00609         }
00610         x = y;
00611         y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00612     }
00613     return(1);
00614 
00615 } /* end of ddSiftUp */

00630 static int
00631 updateUB(
00632   DdManager * table,
00633   int  oldBound,
00634   DdHalfWord * bestOrder,
00635   int  lower,
00636   int  upper)
00637 {
00638     int i;
00639     int newBound = table->keys - table->isolated;
00640 
00641     if (newBound < oldBound) {
00642 #ifdef DD_STATS
00643         (void) fprintf(stdout,"New upper bound = %d\n", newBound);
00644         fflush(stdout);
00645 #endif
00646         for (i = lower; i <= upper; i++)
00647             bestOrder[i-lower] = (DdHalfWord) table->invperm[i];
00648         return(newBound);
00649     } else {
00650         return(oldBound);
00651     }
00652 
00653 } /* end of updateUB */
00654 
00655 
00672 static int
00673 ddCountRoots(
00674   DdManager * table,
00675   int  lower,
00676   int  upper)
00677 {
00678     int i,j;
00679     DdNode *f;
00680 #ifdef __osf__
00681 #pragma pointer_size save
00682 #pragma pointer_size short
00683 #endif
00684     DdNode **nodelist;
00685 #ifdef __osf__
00686 #pragma pointer_size restore
00687 #endif
00688     int slots;
00689     int roots = 0;
00690     int maxlevel = lower;
00691 
00692     for (i = lower; i <= upper; i++) {
00693         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00694         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00695         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00696             f = nodelist[j];
00697             while (f != NULL) {
00698                 /* A node is a root of the DAG if it cannot be
00699                 ** reached by nodes above it. If a node was never
00700                 ** reached during the previous depth-first searches,
00701                 ** then it is a root, and we start a new depth-first
00702                 ** search from it.
00703                 */
00704                 if (!Cudd_IsComplement(f->next)) {
00705                     if (f != table->vars[f->index]) {
00706                         roots++;
00707                     }
00708                 }
00709                 if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddT(f))) {
00710                     cuddT(f)->next = Cudd_Complement(cuddT(f)->next);
00711                     if (table->perm[cuddT(f)->index] > maxlevel)
00712                         maxlevel = table->perm[cuddT(f)->index];
00713                 }
00714                 if (!Cudd_IsConstant(cuddE(f))) {
00715                     Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->next =
00716                         Cudd_Complement(Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->next);
00717                     if (table->perm[Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->index] > maxlevel)
00718                         maxlevel = table->perm[Cudd_Regular(cuddE(f))->index];
00719                 }
00720                 f = Cudd_Regular(f->next);
00721             }
00722         }
00723     }
00724     ddClearGlobal(table, lower, maxlevel);
00725 
00726     return(roots);
00727 
00728 } /* end of ddCountRoots */
00729 
00730 
00745 static void
00746 ddClearGlobal(
00747   DdManager * table,
00748   int  lower,
00749   int  maxlevel)
00750 {
00751     int i,j;
00752     DdNode *f;
00753 #ifdef __osf__
00754 #pragma pointer_size save
00755 #pragma pointer_size short
00756 #endif
00757     DdNode **nodelist;
00758 #ifdef __osf__
00759 #pragma pointer_size restore
00760 #endif
00761     int slots;
00762 
00763     for (i = lower; i <= maxlevel; i++) {
00764         nodelist = table->subtables[i].nodelist;
00765         slots = table->subtables[i].slots;
00766         for (j = 0; j < slots; j++) {
00767             f = nodelist[j];
00768             while (f != NULL) {
00769                 f->next = Cudd_Regular(f->next);
00770                 f = f->next;
00771             }
00772         }
00773     }
00774 
00775 } /* end of ddClearGlobal */
00776 
00777 
00797 static int
00798 computeLB(
00799   DdManager * table,
00800   DdHalfWord * order,
00801   int  roots,
00802   int  cost,
00803   int  lower,
00804   int  upper,
00805   int  level)
00806 {
00807     int i;
00808     int lb = cost;
00809     int lb1 = 0;
00810     int lb2;
00811     int support;
00812     DdHalfWord ref;
00813 
00814     /* The levels not involved in reordering are not going to change.
00815     ** Add their sizes to the lower bound.
00816     */
00817     for (i = 0; i < lower; i++) {
00818         lb += getLevelKeys(table,i);
00819     }
00820     /* If a variable is in the support, then there is going
00821     ** to be at least one node labeled by that variable.
00822     */
00823     for (i = lower; i <= lower+level; i++) {
00824         support = table->subtables[i].keys > 1 ||
00825             table->vars[order[i-lower]]->ref > 1;
00826         lb1 += support;
00827     }
00828 
00829     if (lower+level+1 < table->size) {
00830         if (lower+level < upper)
00831             ref = table->vars[order[level+1]]->ref;
00832         else
00833             ref = table->vars[table->invperm[upper+1]]->ref;
00834         lb2 = table->subtables[lower+level+1].keys -
00835             (ref > (DdHalfWord) 1) - roots;
00836     } else {
00837         lb2 = 0;
00838     }
00839 
00840     lb += lb1 > lb2 ? lb1 : lb2;
00841 
00842     return(lb);
00843 
00844 } /* end of computeLB */
00845 
00846 
00861 static int
00862 updateEntry(
00863   DdManager * table,
00864   DdHalfWord * order,
00865   int  level,
00866   int  cost,
00867   DdHalfWord ** orders,
00868   int * costs,
00869   int  subsets,
00870   char * mask,
00871   int  lower,
00872   int  upper)
00873 {
00874     int i, j;
00875     int size = upper - lower + 1;
00876 
00877     /* Build a mask that says what variables are in this subset. */
00878     for (i = lower; i <= upper; i++)
00879         mask[table->invperm[i]] = 0;
00880     for (i = level; i < size; i++)
00881         mask[order[i]] = 1;
00882 
00883     for (i = 0; i < subsets; i++) {
00884         DdHalfWord *subset = orders[i];
00885         for (j = level; j < size; j++) {
00886             if (mask[subset[j]] == 0)
00887                 break;
00888         }
00889         if (j == size)
00890             break;
00891     }
00892     if (i == subsets || cost < costs[i]) {              /* add or replace */
00893         for (j = 0; j < size; j++)
00894             orders[i][j] = order[j];
00895         costs[i] = cost;
00896         subsets += (i == subsets);
00897     }
00898     return(subsets);
00899 
00900 } /* end of updateEntry */
00901 
00902 
00914 static void
00915 pushDown(
00916   DdHalfWord * order,
00917   int  j,
00918   int  level)
00919 {
00920     int i;
00921     DdHalfWord tmp;
00922 
00923     for (i = j; i < level; i++) {
00924         tmp = order[i];
00925         order[i] = order[i+1];
00926         order[i+1] = tmp;
00927     }
00928     return;
00929 
00930 } /* end of pushDown */
00931 
00932 
00952 static DdHalfWord *
00953 initSymmInfo(
00954   DdManager * table,
00955   int  lower,
00956   int  upper)
00957 {
00958     int level, index, next, nextindex;
00959     DdHalfWord *symmInfo;
00960 
00961     symmInfo =  ALLOC(DdHalfWord, table->size);
00962     if (symmInfo == NULL) return(NULL);
00963 
00964     for (level = lower; level <= upper; level++) {
00965         index = table->invperm[level];
00966         next =  table->subtables[level].next;
00967         nextindex = table->invperm[next];
00968         symmInfo[index] = nextindex;
00969     }
00970     return(symmInfo);
00971 
00972 } /* end of initSymmInfo */
00973 
00974 
00988 static int
00989 checkSymmInfo(
00990   DdManager * table,
00991   DdHalfWord * symmInfo,
00992   int  index,
00993   int  level)
00994 {
00995     int i;
00996 
00997     i = symmInfo[index];
00998     while (i != index) {
00999         if (index < i && table->perm[i] <= level)
01000             return(0);
01001         i = symmInfo[i];
01002     }
01003     return(1);
01004 
01005 } /* end of checkSymmInfo */
01006
